body:
So again let me use @tradebich as an example of a lot of the stupidity on ST

Maybe someone w/ multiple accounts  trying to troll (username) or maybe just a teenager but lets try to help the kid.

I never understand why people think I just hold $baba when Ive said  Im holding & trading, I post info everyday on how to trade it, also how silly so you have to be to think I dont own the $spy? 

People love to talk about a stock you own when its down but I never see a post that talks about my $aapl Buy at $27 in 2007 or $amzn at $400. 

If you're a troll or an idiot that fine, I have no qualms but maybe, if you dont have a clue about what you're talking about just keep it  yourself.

PS an "investment" can take years, sometimes things go lower (BA)
its ok, some of us are not looking for beer money for sat night :o)

links.title: Warren Buffett has grown Berkshire Hathaway's Apple stake to 50% of its entire equity portfolio and nearly a quarter of its $649 billion market cap
links.description: Berkshire Hathaway's Apple holdings of 887 million shares swelled to a value of $159 billion on Friday. That makes the stake worth half of Berkshire's entire equity portfolio, and almost 25% of its $649 billion market capitalization. Warren Buffett started to build Berkshire's position in Apple in 2016 and added to it up until mid-2018.
